title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.34 - Iodine monochloride
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.34 - Iodine monochloride

State Regulations

Iodine monochloride is restricted to a maximum quantity
per vehicle of 60 gallons or 1000 pounds gross weight provided, however, such
liquid is packed in wooden boxes with inside containers not over one quart
capacity each, or with stone or earthenware jugs not over one gallon capacity
each. There are no restrictions on the transport of empty containers which last
contained iodine monochloride provided the accompanying shipping papers show
them to be empty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1211.34

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
